mapper.sql: id, modelId, malfId, optionName, isHint, hintInfo, hintImg, processType, ratio, createdUserId, updatedUserId, creatdTime, updatedTime, isDelete
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from malfunction_options
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into malfunction_options (id, modelId, malfId, optionName, isHint, hintInfo, hintImg, processType, ratio, createdUserId, updatedUserId, creatdTime, updatedTime, isDelete) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{malfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{optionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hintInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hintImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ratio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creatdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update malfunction_options
modelId = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
malfId = #{malfId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
optionName = #{optionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isHint = #{isHint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hintInfo = #{hintInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hintImg = #{hintImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
processType = #{processType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ratio = #{ratio,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createdUserId = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updatedUserId = #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
creatdTime = #{creatdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatedTime = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isDelete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update malfunction_options set modelId = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, malfId = #{malfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, optionName = #{optionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isHint = #{isHint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hintInfo = #{hintInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hintImg = #{hintImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, processType = #{processType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ratio = #{ratio,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createdUserId = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updatedUserId = #{updatedUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creatdTime = #{creatdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedTime = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isDelete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id,optionName,isHint,hintInfo,hintImg FROM malfunction_options WHERE malfid=#{malfid} AND isdelete=0
